ovdesc.p: The individual Bill Registers and Bill Batches are attached and made as a contract through this application.
The id for this application is auto generated once it is defined in AUTO.ID.START and COMPANY files. The id format is BLYYDDDNNNNN.
It is possible to include both individual Bills and Bill Batches in a Bill Contract. When a

BL.BATCH is included in a Bill Contract, the system would expand and display all the BL.REGISTERS attached to the Batch. Only authorized BL.REGISTERS and BL.BATCHES could be included in a Bill Contract.

A BL.REGISTER or BL.BATCH already included in a Bill Contract could not be included again in another Bill Contract. The system would ensure that all the BL.REGISTERS attached to a Bill Contract (either directly or through Batches) are of the same currency and with same LIABILITY.CUSTOMER as specified in the Contract. Bills of different Liability Customers cannot be attached in a Bill Contract.

While it is possible to attach BL.REGISTERS of different BL.TYPE in the same batch, it is not possible to have a contract by attaching different BL.TYPES. However, if the BL.TYPE is of the same product, it can be batched and the Contract can be made.

The system would ensure that all the BL.REGISTERS attached to a Bill Contract (either directly or through Batches) have their START.DATE not later than the VALUE.DATE of the Bill Contract. It is possible to include BL.REGISTERS maturing on different dates in a Bill contract. It is possible to Add/Remove BL.REGISTERS/BL.BATCHES to an already authorised Bill Contract. Copy Option is not allowed in this Application. After the no of days as mentioned in BL.PARAMETER to move it to history from the date of maturity of the BL contract, these details will be moved to history file- BL.BILL.HIST.

The system would first look for an appropriate BTTC record and take the values defined therein. Then it would use the values defined in appropriate BGC record for modification/override purposes. Finally it could use the values from BL.PARAMETER. It is possible that some of the fields

the Contract Group field in

the record

This field holds the activity number, which is triggered by the latest activity in the life-cycle of the transaction.. The activity is 4 digit number composed of three main parts:
First indicates the operation
1. Collection, 2- Discount, 3- Collateral
Second indicates the function
1 -New 2-Amend 3 - Maturity 4- Reversal & 5 -Tracer
Third indicates the type of Bills.
1. Outward & 2 . Inward
Forth & Last digit indicates the storing information details
1. BR level (BL.REGISTER) 2. BL level (BL.BILL)
For example. : For the outward collection input activity, the activity code is
for operation is "1", function "1", type "1" and for BR level information ="1"
Hence the activity code is "BL-1111".
The complete list of activity codes can be found in Users Manual.
